terms.name: Duration of repairs if insurer nominated repairer used

Replace vehicle new for old subject to:
 •	Repairs exceeding 60% of value
 •	You are the only registered keeper
 •	vehicle under one year old
 •	available immediately.
NCD Unaffected and no excess paid
